Question: On December 4, this person dropped into Sun Records where Carl Perkins and Jerry Lee Lewis were recording and jammed with them.
Hints: In late February, this person performed six attendance-record–breaking shows at the Houston Astrodome.
According to Joe Moscheo of the Imperials, the failure of this person's marriage "was a blow from which he never recovered.".
Soon after the show, the Hayride engaged this person for a year's worth of Saturday-night appearances.
